name: INFocusStatusCenter
desc: An object that maintains the user’s current focus status and your app’s ability to access it.

items.name: class var `default`: INFocusStatusCenter
items.desc: The systemwide object that holds the user’s focus status.

items.name: func requestAuthorization(completionHandler: ((INFocusStatusAuthorizationStatus) -> Void)?)
items.desc: Asks the system for access to the user’s focus status.

items.name: var authorizationStatus: INFocusStatusAuthorizationStatus
items.desc: Returns your app’s current ability to access the user’s focus status.

items.name: var focusStatus: INFocusStatus
items.desc: The user’s ability to receive notifications.
